info.title: Schema of ApiCenter events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the ApiCenter events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ApiCenterApiDefinitionAddedEventData.description: Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiCenter.ApiDefinitionAdded event.

ApiCenterApiDefinitionUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ApiCenter.ApiDefinitionUpdated event.
